mapper.update:
update member
memCode = #{memcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memPassword = #{mempassword,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memName = #{memname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memPhone = #{memphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memCreatestaid = #{memcreatestaid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memCreatetime = #{memcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memModifyby = #{memmodifyby,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memModefytime = #{memmodefytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
memBalance = #{membalance,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memStatus = #{memstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
memHeadpath = #{memheadpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where memId = #{memid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update member set memCode = #{memcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memPassword = #{mempassword,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memName = #{memname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memPhone = #{memphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memCreatestaid = #{memcreatestaid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memCreatetime = #{memcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memModifyby = #{memmodifyby,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memModefytime = #{memmodefytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, memBalance = #{membalance,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memStatus = #{memstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memHeadpath = #{memheadpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where memId = #{memid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ,d2.valueNmae memstatusname from member m1 join dictionary d2 on m1.memStatus = d2.valueId where d2.typeCode = 'memstatus' order by m1.memId asc
